documents.document: @nikommen @elizabethforma Or run yourself...

@CaroleRadziwill @mmfa Greedy for money, greedy for power, greedy for attention from any direction = this gal...
@ChelseaClinton Too many men with legislative power... too many men in places of power, period. Our bodies our OURS. No rights 4 rapists!
@DebraMessing It's true... the alt right shows up to counter our efforts... No doubt in my mind... protesters stand proud in pink hats! ✌️️
@DonnieWahlberg I am with this idea... Bigly...😉
@YolandaHFoster @GiGiHadid @BritishVogue If only you all lent your voices to things bigger than fashion...
@Pontifex This is awesome! 🙏✌️️🙏✌️️
@chelseahandler @IvankaTrump Besides America going down, ivanka is a huuuuge disappointment/disgrace...😔
@nytimes But nothing about the Mosque...
@SophiaBush This administration is HEARTLESS, COLD BLOODED, and RUTHLESS!
@SophiaBush and I am grateful for you! 😌💕🙏✌️️
@springsteen I am shocked by the response here... It is no longer conservative and liberal.. Let's be benevolent examples for our Children!
@SenWarren @realDonaldTrump @GoldmanSachs "FRAUD"...now there is a word that defines this negative administration...😔
@CoryBooker That is absolutely true, but different rules for those that aren't waspy... Shameful....😔
@kmainsworth21 @JoeyVarcoMusic @CBSNews You need to slow your roll, Kristin.. Haters hate themselves the most! Watch your words, please..
@BetteMidler Laughed out loud...😌
@dinamanzo Poor Barron... Imagine having a dad who cares so little about his future...😔
@ABC This dude has his hands in too many pots.. He wants to control all, and show his barely beating heart cares for only ego and money..😔
@CBSNews With humor I say... Can we send these to the White House? 😉😉😉
@nytimes This administration is so unfeeling and greedy. They want everything for their kind only. Rich, white, and petty...
@DougDavidsonYR I get your point, and appreciate your tenacity, but as a fan I would appreciate your transparency... own your truth...✌️️
@stassi @MiscoJackie @BrentMBailey @AmandaIbb @annyeleisme If you ladies can't be honest about your bully ways... C'mom. Be real.
@THR Since I don't have ANYTHING nice to say...🤐🙏
@TheAmyBrenneman From your lips to the World's ears... staying woke! ✨🙏✌️️✨
@CBSNews @PressSec YOU GO! We caring Humans will stay... and take all your bigot comrades with you! ✌️️
@SenSanders Truth! We need to be present, more now then ever! Love and Peace! ✨💕🙏✌️️💕✨
@InspowerBooks Haters hate themselves the most...
@TennisChannel Roger Federer is forever my Man. He is beautiful to watch! Grace, Charm, Humility!
@BarbraStreisand Same with the wall... He has no interests in Mexico...smh
@MrJerryOC @hallmarkchannel @Hallmark @hallmarkmovie I love watching this real life couple do their thing...😌
@ChrisMurphyCT This is ... there are no words! 😓😱
@SenWarren YesWeAre..What makes White People think they are all that? We are nothing without diversity... Diversity = An Open Heart..✌️️🙏💗
@cher ego and greed...that's all he is about... what an embarrassment to this Country he is...😔😖😔😖
@kumailn @SarahKSilverman Or, a needy child/man with his own plan...😔
@CoryBooker @FPasiuk @michellemalkin @CNNPolitics But I love you going high to the haters. Haters hate themselves the most...✌️️
@CoryBooker @FPasiuk @michellemalkin @CNNPolitics The pharmaceuticals, Cory? I want to have Faith in you, but big pharma? Dang it...
@CBSNews You shut yours... shame on you, Fool! 😖
@TheView Trump is all ego and greed! 😓
@HeatherDTaylor bye now...
@HeatherDTaylor Didn't you already say that? 🙄Barron's problems are bigger than a skit on SNL!
@HeatherDTaylor @latimes @DarciWLTX I said the Children should be kept out of it, so we agree on that. It's bound to happen though.
@klgandhoda This is life...🙏
@KTVU Everyone needs to slow their roll! Hate fixes nothing! Both sides need to take a time out! Find your calling to make change. No hate 🚫
@HeatherDTaylor @latimes @DarciWLTX I DO agree, however, that children should be excluded from the banter...
@HeatherDTaylor @latimes @DarciWLTX The potus said some things about people that were pretty ugly...without apology...
@Sherridacherry @Andy I don't believe you and that's okay. Agree to disagree. ✌️️
@Sherridacherry @Andy Haters hate themselves the most... And this one is full of self-hatred... Find the light and peace will follow! ✌️️
@EW Who?
@springyfield @TheAmyBrenneman You can feel anything you want, but to tell another to be silent is simply not okay while you spew disrespect
@SFGate He should release, but the fact that he doesn't is proof of his corruption and lack of integrity...like we didn't already know...
@usweekly They don't all have to drink from the same corrupted Cruel-aid...
@summerbrennan @HillaryClinton Why didn't Hillary march? Yes to the inauguration and no to the March...feeling disappointed...
@CaroleRadziwill And Hillary...
@TheView @ABC2020 I really feel sick about this...literally...Not hating... So much fear for America!
@andrealetania1 Agree to disagree... btw, the opposite of love is indifference, like how I feel about you...indifferent...🙏✌️️
@andrealetania1 Never use hate as a crutch for fear, sadness, or disappointment. Again, haters must look inward... ✌️️
@DebraMessing Haters hate themselves most, Ms. Messing...
@TIME First time in a long time that I see a flawed decision by our President. 😔
@FoxNews @MeghanMcCain That is a pathetic and wicked thing to say. Shame on you...
@ABC How can people not respect this beautiful Man, Father, Husband! A Beautiful First Family! ⭐️
@CBSNews Look at these smart and timely words! Hope is alive! Believe it. Create it! 🙏✌️️
@SarahKSilverman Seriously, OMG... out of the mouth of babes...😔
@andrealetania1 @THR @MrRPMurphy @ACSFX I'm just going to keep posting this: Haters hate themselves the most! 🙏✌️️
@MEGBusfield Melissa Gilbert... haters hate themselves most... you rock on... proud of your clear mindedness! 🙏
@hallmarkchannel Your movies bring love alive for me! Predictable? Yes. But the dream is inferred! Love the dream! 💗
@CoryBooker @aishatyler True, and you voting in favor of pharmaceuticals is also poor form! 😔
@SarahKSilverman let's face it, the repeal puts more money in the richest pockets in America. Period. Greed is killing America! 😔
@ABC This Gentleman is a National Treasure! I wish I would not have taken him and President Obama for granted. Now we watch America burn!!!!
@WhiteHouse @WhoopiGoldberg Northern California is crying, and has been for days... Mother Nature knows Trump is an American tragedy! 😩
@CBSNews God, please be with us... I hope we can! 😖
@THR And now we have what? Trash called Trump! 😭😢😓😥
@NFL I am so happy for Aaron and GB, but I'm a girl's, girl...so: so, so happy for Olivia and the World she and Aaron share!... Enjoy... 👍🌟
@NFL Loving the matchup... Olivia fan... But, who doesn't love a Manning... May the best team win... 😉
@hallmarkchannel I just want to thank you for your predictable, feel good, Christmas movies! They always warm my heart! ✨🙏☺️
@SusanSarandon There is no blame. HC won the people's vote. dp won by electoral blah blah blah...
@SenSanders Ideally, yes, but in actuality, I don't think so...
@kellybensimon We need it now, for sure. ✌️️
@TheView I agree! Half of us are racist and/or sexist...✨😔🙏✨
@hodakotb Thank you and Marianne for these hopeful words... ✨🙏✨
@TheView Why do Christians so often look like bigots...picking and choosing the words that matter, and disregarding pure hatred...
@TheTalkCBS I feel beyond honored to have been my Mom's teammate during the finish of her life! The Gratitude I feel, beyond measure! 💞🙏💞
It is a frightening time! 😔😔😔
I am having a moment! Trump is dangerous, shady, and aggressive, and the fact that America is allowing this disgrace to even be considered..
@WhiteHouse What is typical? 🤔
@usopen Amazing play... Everything a final should be! ☺️⭐️
@enews I hope this friendship can withstand this ugly, ugly election ✨✌️
@usopen I wish they both could have won... Love the new faces of Women's Tennis! ✨⭐️✨⭐️ Congratulations to Ms. Kerber! 🎾🎾🎾🎯
@usopen Seem to be leaning towards Kerber ...Can't explain it...She reminds me of a cross between Evert and Navratilova! What's not to love?
@usopen It looks miserably hot there... So much respect for athletes!
@usopen I love this matchup... I have no favorite, really..happy either way! Martina and Steffi must be proud! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
@GMA There are good eggs out there... Calling all good eggs! Let's be the best part of the solution! ☺️ This man is a sweetheart! ⭐️👍
@MaxBoot @DebraMessing Trump is a snake! 😠
@CNN US Open is amazing this year! Serena is a champion for all time, no matter what! Pliskova was so calm and collected..a champ, for sure!
@Cigna Good ad with the tv docs... But kind of shows just how much money you have... Maybe more humility, and lower premiums or co-pays! ✌️
@jonfavs @jesseleesoffer So disrespectful, and ugly!
@nytimes An amazing memory for this couple, and now there is a legendary story about how millions of people around the World shared the day!
@DanaDelany Yes, Dana Delany! We have a care for someone besides yourself problem as well! An apology, and owning the err shows compassion!
@usopen Question: Do you still challenge when you're kicking butt? Is there a sportsmanship issue around that question? 🤔
@usopen I love this sport, but not the rage that players show in crisis. Don't smash a racket. It changes my favor for a player. Kids watch.
